name: LabelBeams
description: Labels Beams with a Text processing with an optional custom string input

inputParameters.name: BaseText
inputParameters.description: Text to be applied to each Beam. If none is given, a standard identifier will be used.

inputParameters.name: CharToReplace
inputParameters.description: Optional character in the BaseText to be replaced by Beam.attributes. This only works if Attributes is not empty and a single BaseText is given.

inputParameters.name: Attributes
inputParameters.description: Beam attribute names to substitute into the BaseText.

inputParameters.name: RefSide
inputParameters.description: side on which to apply the Text.

outputParameters.name: LabelFeature
outputParameters.description: Label feature to be added to timber model.
